formal_name:
The Legend of Zelda
Main Theme Medley
description:
See 3D footage of The Legend of Zelda Main Theme Medley* performed by a full orchestra. This and other songs were included on a CD packed with the Legend of Zelda™: Skyward Sword game for the Wii™ console, released in Dec. 2011.

*This video was also available via the Nintendo Video application in 2011.
name:
The Legend of Zelda
Main Theme Medley
disclaimer:
You may need to upgrade your current SD Card to a compatible SDHC Card or microSDHC Card with enough available space to download this software.
Visit support.nintendo.com for information about storage options. Sold separately.
